title: Heart's Surrender
description: She is Rissa, the proud, beautiful daughter of the Lord Commander of the warrior planet, Bellator. He is Morigan, leader of the Cat People, celebrated for his extraordinary telepathic powers and legendary lover's skills -- sworn to vengeance against Rissa's invading race.It is destiny that brings Rissa to the untamed planet Agrica... and into Morigan's savage lair. But it is desire that steals her will, ignites her wildest passions -- and sweeps them both toward a thrilling, irresistible unknown...
author: Kathleen  Morgan
